text: Matthew English is an English rugby league footballer who plays as a for the Huddersfield Giants in the Super League and the England Knights at international level. He spent time on loan from Huddersfield at the Dewsbury Rams in the Betfred Championship. ==Background== English was born in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England. ==Career== Matty is a product of the Giants' academy system and is nicknamed 'The polar bear'.https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/rugby-league/meet-matty-english-giant- polar-12142088 https://www.giantsrl.com/locker-room/profile/664/matty-english He represented England academy on tour to Australia https://www.giantsrl.com/locker-room/profile/664/matty-english In 2017 he made his Challenge Cup début for Huddersfield against the Swinton Lions. ==International career== In 2019 Matty was called into the England Knights squad along with 3 other Giants players https://www.yorkshirepost.co.uk/sport/rugby-league/huddersfield- giants/huddersfield-giants-quartet-are-selected-for-england-knights- squad-1-9674104 In 2019 he was selected for the England Knights against Jamaica at Headingley Rugby Stadium. ==References== ==External links== *Huddersfield Giants profile *SL profile Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Rugby league props Category:English rugby league players Category:Huddersfield Giants players
title: Matty English
